metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15994 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: rsync 3.1.3-development before 2017-10-24 mishandles archaic checksums, which makes it easier for remote attackers to bypass intended access restrictions. NOTE: the rsync development branch has significant use beyond the rsync developers, e.g., the code has been copied for use in various GitHub projects.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> introduced and fixed during 3.1.3 development period

criterions.comment: rsync: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
